name: SolvePoly
description:
In SolvePoly you are playing as a detective. You will meet with big variety of stories, BUT you don’t have to always to find all clues in some cases. Clues – such as objects, informations from private messages, locked safes could mislead you. You'll have to search in flats, villa, construction area and more!

Investigate accidents, murders and more in this FREE GAME!

Highlights

-Low poly and good graphics

-The games core mechanics (like saving, scripts) are optimized

-Story-rich gameplay - every level brings another mystery!

-All levels are handcrafted by the developer - not randomized

-Every level have lots of interactable things - desktop computers, safes and more!

-This game is not finished, this means the game will get updates, more features!

PLEASE, if you have ideas/ feedback about the game let me know on itch.io or on our DISCORD SERVER > https://discord.gg/e7Rv3qT
